meta.label: Email address tester
meta.description:
The recipe takes as input a dataset of contacts, with one email address per row, and verify the validity of the emails addresses.
Two columns are added in the output dataset: one boolean for email validation, and one giving the reason if an email is not valid.
Three different tests are available for email validation:
- Format validation
- Disposable domain detection
- MX record domain detection

params.name: email_column
params.label: Email (column)
params.description: The dataset must contain one mail per row in a column.

selectChoices.label: Format validation + Disposable domain detection + MX record domain detection
